EmailTemplate.description: Request sent to CRC when they are trying to quote GSE to an end customer
EmailTemplate.name: End User Requests
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}{!Case.Contact}{!Case.Product_Part__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Fellow Colleague,
Ground Support Solution's will be more than happy to help. Please indicate who will be the end user and forward their request directly to us, including point-of-contact. GSS screens all customer requests to determine if they have a Honeywell license agreement prior to providing quotations. We will work directly with the end user to ensure their request is answered.
Best Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
